description: A set of SAML values that uniquely identify this person, consistently across TAS apps, and with any number of potential IdPs

_88principalType.description: a class of principal (typically a human) identifiable by SSO. In theory developer-defined but for now only TAS can create.

$eref.description: a class of principal (typically a human) identifiable by SSO. In theory developer-defined but for now only TAS can create.

___samlKey.description: key of the SAML assertion with the the TAS core SAML database
